## Additions

Add to commands section:

```markdown
## Attachments

For content review workflows, attach screenshots to ticks:

### Attach a file
\`\`\`bash
tk attach <tick-id> <file> [--description "caption"]
\`\`\`

### List attachments
\`\`\`bash
tk attachments <tick-id>
\`\`\`

### Remove attachment
\`\`\`bash
tk detach <tick-id> <attachment-id>
\`\`\`

### Requirements
- Requires tickboard.dev token in ~/.tickboardrc
- Allowed types: PNG, JPEG, GIF, WebP
- Max size: 10MB per file
- Max 10 attachments per tick
```

## Context for LLM

Add guidance for when to use attachments:
